beasts.name: Lion
beasts.elaboration: Possesses a dignified and commanding presence, inspiring respect and naturally taking charge.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your roar commands attention, but remember even the king of the jungle needs to listen to the whispers of the savanna to truly lead.

beasts.name: Dolphin
beasts.elaboration: Known for being highly communicative, intelligent, and adaptable in social situations, approaching life with a joyful and inquisitive spirit.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your joyful leaps make waves, but ensure your playful currents don't inadvertently capsize smaller boats in the shared ocean of collaboration.

beasts.name: Owl
beasts.elaboration: Often seen as patient and methodical, with a keen eye for detail, preferring to watch, listen, and gather information before acting.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: While your silent observation gathers all the secrets of the night, remember that sometimes hooting your insights is necessary for the forest to thrive.

beasts.name: Wolf
beasts.elaboration: Resilient and resourceful, especially when working with trusted allies, forming strong bonds and fiercely devoted to their 'pack.'
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your loyalty to the pack is your strength, but be wary that the lone wolf's howl for independence isn't misinterpreted as a challenge to the hunt.

beasts.name: Fox
beasts.elaboration: Quick-witted and agile, always seeming to be one step ahead, excelling at finding ingenious solutions to problems.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your cunning can navigate any maze, but ensure your clever shortcuts don't leave others feeling like they've been outfoxed rather than included.

beasts.name: Bear
beasts.elaboration: Resourceful and self-sufficient, often embodying a quiet authority, possessing immense power used to defend and nurture.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your mighty presence offers great comfort and protection, but be mindful that not every situation requires a bear hug – sometimes a gentle paw is enough.

beasts.name: Dragon
beasts.elaboration: A magnificent, somewhat chubby dragon with smooth, iridescent blue-green scales. Often solitary but influential, with a long-term perspective, radiating an aura of power and ancient knowledge.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your hoard of wisdom is vast and your fire bright, but take care that your shadow doesn't inadvertently obscure the growth of smaller flames around you.

beasts.name: Phoenix
beasts.elaboration: Symbolizes rebirth, renewal, and the enduring power of the spirit, rising from setbacks stronger and renewed, inspiring others.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Rising from the ashes is your signature, but try not to set too many fires just to demonstrate your remarkable ability to be reborn.

beasts.name: Unicorn
beasts.elaboration: Believed to have healing qualities and represents the pursuit of the ideal, embodying innocence, sincerity, and untainted intentions.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your pure heart sees the best in all, but remember that even in enchanted forests, not every glitter is gold – sometimes it's just a cleverly disguised pixie trap.

beasts.name: Griffin
beasts.elaboration: A symbol of courage, wisdom, and the defense of treasures or sacred places, dedicated to protecting and watching over what is valued.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Guarding treasures and upholding justice is a noble flight, but ensure your keen eyes also spot opportunities for collaboration, not just transgressions.

beasts.name: Sprite
beasts.elaboration: A vibrant and colorful, androgynous human-like being with delicate, shimmering butterfly-like wings. Mystical and serene, known for playful deception and versatile intellect.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your illusions dance with delight, but ensure your playful tricks don't weave a web where even you forget what's real.

beasts.name: Elephant
beasts.elaboration: A gentle giant that embodies strength tempered with profound sensitivity and intelligence, forming strong emotional connections and valuing family.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: You never forget, which is a great strength, but ensure your long memory serves to build bridges from the past, not walls around old grievances.

beasts.name: Land Slug
beasts.elaboration: Thrives by finding its niche and demonstrates tenacity through slow, steady progress rather than overt displays. Content with simplicity.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your steady pace ensures you never miss the details, but be sure to leave a visible (albeit slimy) trail so others can appreciate the ground you've covered, and perhaps avoid accidentally paving over your progress.

beasts.name: Sphinx
beasts.elaboration: An enigmatic guardian of ancient wisdom, the Sphinx challenges those who approach with intellectual puzzles, valuing insight and understanding above all.
beasts.wordsOfWisdom: Your knowledge is a labyrinth only the worthy can navigate; ensure your riddles illuminate rather than merely ensnare, for true wisdom seeks to be shared, not just hoarded.

quizdefinitions.title: Find Your Inner Beast
quizdefinitions.description: Answer these questions thoughtfully to unveil the animal spirit that resonates most with your personality.

questions.text: When you're at a party or social gathering, where are you most likely to be found?

answers.text: In the middle of a lively group, energizing the conversation.
Having a deep, meaningful conversation with one or two people.
Observing from the sidelines, taking it all in before engaging.
Enjoying my own company, perhaps near the snacks, perfectly content.

questions.text: There's a complex problem at work/school. Your first instinct is to:

answers.text: Gather all data, analyze options, and devise a step-by-step plan.
Find a clever, unconventional angle that others might have missed.
Tackle it head-on with courage and decisive action.
Rally the team and work collaboratively to find a solution.

questions.text: When you face a significant setback or failure, how do you typically react?

answers.text: See it as a chance to learn, rebuild, and come back stronger.
Focus on protecting what's important and defending your position.
Quickly adapt to the new situation and find an alternative path.
Withdraw to process, understanding that some things take time to heal/resolve.

questions.text: What drives you most in life?

answers.text: Achieving great things and making a powerful impact.
Seeking truth, understanding, and profound knowledge.
Ensuring fairness, protecting the vulnerable, and upholding ideals.
Spreading kindness, fostering harmony, and connecting with others.

questions.text: When you need to communicate an important idea, you usually:

answers.text: State it clearly, confidently, and directly to get your point across.
Listen carefully to others first, then offer a thoughtful, well-considered response.
Use humor and playful language to make your message engaging.
Speak with compassion, aiming to connect emotionally and ensure understanding.
